name: Headland Forts
role_in_state: Strategic coastal defense and maritime waystation
economy_niches: ship repair & hull care for convoy fleets
provisioning garrisons and passing fleets (salted stores)
small-scale salted/dried fisheries for long voyages
culture_adjustments: militarized clan leadership with duty-driven rank
ritualized nightwatch and beacon rites unique to forts
sea-proverb oral forms shortened into watch-codes
practical austerity in feasts; storehouse-first mentality

ritual reagents rationed by garrison command
construction limited by cliffs and access paths
notes: seasonal garrison rotations shape local market cycles
beacons serve both practical navigation and sanctioned augury relay
